item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a data-driven finance + analytics professional focused on using AI and modern tooling to turn complex information into decisions.

Focus areas

  • Finance & macro (rates, inflation, markets)
  • Analytics (Python, SQL, dashboards)
  • AI (LLMs, automation, applied ML)

What I’m looking for Roles where I can combine finance thinking + analytics + AI to drive measurable impact.

item.title: AI + Finance Notes
item.description:
Short, weekly notes showing what I’m learning and building.

  • Week 1: Yield curve inversion — what it really means (+ charts)
  • Week 2: How central banks transmit policy into rates
  • Week 3: LLMs in finance — practical use cases & risks

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Project 1 — Yield Curve Dashboard (Finance + Data)

Problem: Explain recession signals to non-technical audiences
Approach: Pulled rate data → cleaned in Python → built visuals
Tools: Python, Pandas, Tableau/Power BI
Outcome: Clear story in <5 charts + shareable dashboard
Links: GitHub | Live demo

Project 2 — AI Finance News Summarizer (LLM)

Problem: Too much finance news, low signal-to-noise
Approach: RAG-style pipeline → topic clustering → summary
Tools: Python, LLM API, vector search
Outcome: Daily digest + trend detection
Links: GitHub | Write-up
